ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordTypeId = '012G00000014QHc', ISPICKVAL( Industry__c ,"Other"), ISPICKVAL( Department__c ,"Pipeline"), ISBLANK( What_does_the_prospect_sell__c ), ISBLANK( What_makes_you_different__c ), ISBLANK( How_much_does_your_serviceproduct_cost__c ), ISBLANK( What_is_the_sweet_spot__c ), ISBLANK( What_industry_areas_are_we_targeting__c ), ISBLANK( Is_the_list_in_Excel_with_phone_numbers__c ), ISBLANK( What_is_the_length_of_their_sales_cycle__c ), ISBLANK( What_is_their_close_rate_on_cold_calls__c ), ISBLANK( Are_they_requesting_anything_special__c ), ISBLANK( Do_they_understand_what_they_are_buying__c ), ISBLANK( What_will_make_this_a_long_term_partner__c ) )
